original_text: It is the smallest of all seeds, but when it has grown it is larger than all the garden plants and becomes a tree, so that the birds of the air come and make nests in its branches.”
korean_text: 이는 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되 자란 후에는 풀보다 커서 나무가 되매 공중의 새들이 와서 그 가지에 깃들이느니라

sentences.original_text: It is the smallest of all seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 씨앗 중에서 가장 작습니다

sentences.original_text: it is larger than all the garden plants
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 정원 식물보다 더 큽니다

sentences.original_text: so that the birds of the air come
and make nests in its branches
